title: Watch VOD mission not working....
body:
i already got the "WATCH REWARDS ARE CORRECTLY SET UP FOR YOUR ACCOUNT" message but still no rewards ,ayy wut?

i already did this 2 hours ago btw

replies.body: Same here, I watched the OPL finals while logged in and made sure it was set up correctly but still it did not count towards the mission.
Same tried everything watch multiple vods was signed in and everything fix this riot only few days left and it still says im 0/3
